citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:40pm on July 15,
2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by phone call. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and
records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement
action.
Additional Inspectors:
Lindsay Livingston, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:40pm on July 15, 
2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by phone call. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and 
records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement 
action. 
 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
Lindsay Livingston, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section
